Prickly Heat.Procedure:
Grind the dried orange peels till you get a powder(you can ideally dry the peels in the sun after having eaten the fruit).
Mix a tablespoon of this powder with the yogurt till you get a smooth paste.Apply this paste to your face and keep it on for about 20 minutes.Rinse with cold water.

Mix the yogurt and lemon juice thoroughly.
Apply the resultant paste to your face and leave it on for about 20 minutes.Wash your face with cold water.

Take the raw milk in a bowl and add the strands of saffron to it.
Let the strands stay in the milk for three to four hours.Post that,apply this mix to your cleansed face.Keep it on for about 20 minutes, after which you can wash off with lukewarm water.

Apply the tomato pulp to your face and let it stay for about 20 minutes.
Wash off with plain water.

Dry the lemon rind in the sun and grind it till you get a fine powder.
Mix the powder with the milk and make a smooth paste.
Apply this paste to your face and leave it on for 20 minutes.Wash your face with warm water and immediately follow with a cooling toner.

Take a tablespoon of raw honey and then warm it up by rubbing it with your fingertips.
Apply the warm honey all over your face.
Leave this natural mask for about ten minutes and then wash it off gently with warm water.Pat your face dry with a fresh towel or cloth.

Pour four to five drops of raw honey on a piece of lemon wedge.
Rub the lemon all over your face only for a single minute. Wash your face with cold water after leaving the lemon and honey mixture for maximum five minutes.

A mixture of olive oil and sea salt is needed. The ratio of the mixture must be two to one.
Applying this body scrub and massage for a few minutes.Rinse with cool water.

Squeeze out coconut milk from grated raw coconut.
Apply this milk all over your face, including lips. You will certainly gain a glowing skin.This is one of the best natural tips for skin care.

Take a piece of cotton ball and dip it in un-boiled milk.
Wipe your tired face with it for instant freshness.
Mix the ingredients together and apply the paste over the entire face and leave it as a mask for ten to fifteen minutes.Take a wet tissue and clean your face with it.

Apply a few drops of pure castor oil on your face and massage it well.
Leave it for half an hour or so, and then wipe with a wet cloth.

Stretch Marks.Procedures:
Ensure you get at least 7 hours of sleep every day.
Besides, it makes no harm if you take a small nap during the day not more than 30 minutes!

Apply almond oil under the eyes several times a day.
Almond oil is rich in Vitamin E, a nourishing vitamin for skin.

Slice the potato and place it on the affected spot for around 20 minutes.
Alternatively, you can apply the juice of raw potato directly on the hollow spots.

Ingredients: 2 used Green or Black teabags placed in Refrigerator for 30-40 minutes
2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil
Warts.Procedure:
Mix 2 drops of jasmine essential oil and 2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil.
Apply to the affected area and gently massage for 3-4 minutes.
Leave for 20-30 minutes and rinse with lukewarm water.
Repeat regularly until results are visible
